definition: see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]
end/finish
surname Cheng
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
concern/wife and children
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
love will find a way (idiom)
pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

sentences.english: The chemistry was instant and they married in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 兩人立即起了化學反應，並於2007年終成眷屬。

sentences.english: The Sweethearts Spring has the magic to bless people in love with the happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 情侶泉具有神奇的魔力，使相愛的人終成眷屬。

sentences.english: The lovers are united at the conclusion of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 電影結尾時這對情侶終成眷屬。

sentences.english: Rich people get married, money's life pain.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人終成眷屬，沒錢人一生痛苦。

definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
happy/blissful
to love each other
companion
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
a marriage predestined by fate
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
two trees that grow together as one/fig. conjugal union
to have one's wish fulfilled
good luck
